evidence.claim: Geisinger utilizes AWS services for their cloud infrastructure.
The organization is compliant with HIPAA regulations for their healthcare services.
Geisinger has implemented FHIR standards for data exchange.
X12 EDI transactions are utilized for medical billing processes at Geisinger.
Integration of HL7 protocols for electronic data exchange was mentioned in their technical documentation.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence found of sending/receiving X12 transactions or being a clearinghouse.
